Class RequestBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.naturalis.oaipmh.rest.RequestBuilder

  • public class RequestBuilder
extends Object
    Builds OAIPMHRequest objects from HTTP URLs.
    Author:
    Ayco Holleman

    • Method Detail

      • newInstance

        public static RequestBuilder newInstance()

      • setResumptionTokenParser

        public RequestBuilder setResumptionTokenParser(IResumptionTokenParser parser)
        Sets the resumption token parser used to decompose the resumptionToken query parameter (if any). You would ordinarily retrieve the parser from an IOAIRepository implementation. If this method is not called before calling build(UriInfo), the default parser is used.
        Parameters:
        parser -
        Returns:
